name: Zai Metajo
overview: Zai Metajo is the second part of the story described in Metajo. This time, the player controls a group of secret agents within the students committee of the Girls High School attached to the Meta-Topology University, led by Yurika Asano. Endowed with special powers, the girls try to protect the integrity of the school against opponents of meta-topology, as well as possible traitors within their own ranks. Gameplay-wise, this chapter is nearly identical to the first one, relying on the same tactical RPG template with melee attacks and special meta-topology powers. The game offers a few more branching missions, slight interface changes, and the possibility to gamble at a casino.
